00034 #include <tclap/CmdLine.h>
00035 
00036 #include "itkImageFileReader.h"
00037 #include "itkImageFileWriter.h"
00038 
00039 #include "itkImage.h"
00040 
00041 #include "../Code/Segmentation/btkLabelPropagationTool.h"
00042 
00043 #include <vector>
00044 #include <sstream>
00045 
00046 //#include <boost/program_options.hpp>
00047 //namespace po = boost::program_options;
00048 
00049 int main(int argc, char** argv)
00050 {
00051   try {  
00052 
00053   TCLAP::CmdLine cmd("Label propagation", ' ', "1.0", true);
00054 
00055   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> inputImageArg("i","image_file","input image file (short)",true,"","string");
00056   cmd.add( inputImageArg );
00057   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> outputImageArg("o","output_file","output image file (short)",true,"","string");
00058   cmd.add( outputImageArg );
00059   
00060   TCLAP::MultiArg<std::string> labelImageArg("l","label_file","label image of the textbook (short) (possible multiple inputs) ",true,"string");
00061   cmd.add( labelImageArg ); 
00062   TCLAP::MultiArg<std::string> anatomicalImageArg("a","anatomical_file","anatomical image of the textbook (short) (possible multiple inputs) ",true,"string");
00063   cmd.add( anatomicalImageArg );
00064   
00065   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> inputMaskArg("m","mask_file","filename of the mask image",false,"","string");
00066   cmd.add( inputMaskArg );
00067   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> outputWeightArg("w","weight_file","filename of the output weight map",false,"","string");
00068   cmd.add( outputWeightArg );
00069   TCLAP::MultiArg< int > outputFuzzyWeightsArg("","fuzzy_weights","set of labels for fuzzy weight output 3D images (possible multiple inputs -- only using the block mode)",false,"int");
00070   cmd.add( outputFuzzyWeightsArg );   
00071   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> inputHwnArg("","hwn_map","filename of the input hwn map",false,"","string");
00072   cmd.add( inputHwnArg );
00073   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> inputHwvsArg("","hwvs_map","filename of the hwvs map",false,"","string");
00074   cmd.add( inputHwvsArg );
00075   TCLAP::ValueArg< float > paddingArg("p","pad","padding value (used if no mask image is provided), default is -1",false,-1,"float");
00076   cmd.add( paddingArg );
00077   TCLAP::ValueArg< int > hwnArg("","hwn","patch half size (default is 1)",false,1,"int");
00078   cmd.add( hwnArg );
00079   TCLAP::ValueArg< int > hwvsArg("","hwvs","half size of the volume search area, i.e. the spatial bandwidth (default is 5)",false,5,"int");
00080   cmd.add( hwvsArg );
00081   TCLAP::ValueArg< float > betaArg("b","beta","beta: smoothing parameter (high beta produces smoother result, default is 1)",false,1,"float");
00082   cmd.add( betaArg );
00083   TCLAP::ValueArg< int > blockArg("","block","0: pointwise, 1: blockwise, 2: fast blockwise (default is 1)",false,2,"int");
00084   cmd.add( blockArg );
00085   TCLAP::ValueArg< int > centerArg("c","center","weight of the central patch (possible value: 0, 1, -1 (max)) (default is -1)",false,-1,"int");
00086   cmd.add( centerArg );
00087   TCLAP::ValueArg< int > optimizedArg("","opt","optimized mode (use mean and standard deviation of patches) (0: no, 1: yes) (default is 1)",false,1,"int");
00088   cmd.add( optimizedArg );
00089   TCLAP::ValueArg< float > lowerMeanThresholdArg("","lmt","lower mean threshold (0.95 by default) -- for optimized mode only",false,0.95,"float");
00090   cmd.add( lowerMeanThresholdArg );
00091   TCLAP::ValueArg< float > lowerVarianceThresholdArg("","lvt","lower variance threshold (0.5 by default) -- for optimized mode only",false,0.5,"float");
00092   cmd.add( lowerVarianceThresholdArg );
00093   TCLAP::ValueArg< int > aggregationArg("","aggregation","aggregation strategy (0: max weight, 1: fixed weight (=1))",false,1,"int");
00094   cmd.add( aggregationArg );
00095   TCLAP::ValueArg< int > modeArg("","mode","mode (0: pair-wise, 1: groupwise, -1: groupwise denoising)",false,0,"int");
00096   cmd.add( modeArg );
00097   TCLAP::ValueArg< int > normalizationArg("","normalization","intensity normalization -- makes the patches invariant to intensity changes (0: no, 1: yes)",false,0,"int");
00098   cmd.add( normalizationArg );
00099   TCLAP::ValueArg< int > minLabelArg("","minLabel","minimum label (default : -1)",false,-1,"int");
00100   cmd.add( minLabelArg );
00101   
00102   // Parse the args.
00103   cmd.parse( argc, argv );
00104 
00105     
00106   // Get the value parsed by each arg. 
00107   std::string input_file       = inputImageArg.getValue();
00108   std::string output_file      = outputImageArg.getValue();
00109   
00110   std::vector<std::string> anatomical_file = anatomicalImageArg.getValue();
00111   std::vector<std::string> label_file      = labelImageArg.getValue();
00112 
00113   std::string mask_file        = inputMaskArg.getValue();
00114   std::string weight_file      = outputWeightArg.getValue();
00115   std::vector<int> fuzzy_weights = outputFuzzyWeightsArg.getValue();
00116 
00117   std::string hwn_file         = inputHwnArg.getValue();   
00118   std::string hwvs_file        = inputHwvsArg.getValue();      
00119   
00120   float padding                = paddingArg.getValue();
00121   int hwn                      = hwnArg.getValue();
00122   int hwvs                     = hwvsArg.getValue();
00123   float beta                   = betaArg.getValue();
00124   int block                    = blockArg.getValue();
00125   int center                   = centerArg.getValue();
00126   int optimized                = optimizedArg.getValue();
00127   float lowerMeanThreshold     = lowerMeanThresholdArg.getValue();
00128   float lowerVarianceThreshold = lowerVarianceThresholdArg.getValue();
00129   int aggregation              = aggregationArg.getValue();
00130   int mode                     = modeArg.getValue();
00131   int normalization            = normalizationArg.getValue();
00132   int minLabel                 = minLabelArg.getValue();
00133   
00134   std::cout<<" input file : "<<input_file<<"\n";
00135   std::cout << "Number of anatomical image files is: " << anatomical_file.size() << "\n";
00136   for(unsigned int i=0; i<anatomical_file.size();i++)
00137     std::cout<<"   anatomical image file "<<i+1<<" : "<<anatomical_file[i]<<"\n";
00138   std::cout << "Number of label image files is: " << label_file.size() << "\n";
00139   for(unsigned int i=0; i<label_file.size();i++)
00140     std::cout<<"   label image file "<<i+1<<" : "<<label_file[i]<<"\n";   
00141   
00142   if(mask_file=="")
00143     std::cout<<"No mask image file given. The padding value ("<<padding<<") will be used instead.\n";
00144   else
00145     std::cout<<"   mask image file "<<mask_file<<"\n";  
00146   
00147   //ITK declaration
00148   typedef short PixelType;
00149   const   unsigned int        Dimension = 3;
00150   typedef itk::Image< PixelType, Dimension >    ImageType; //same type for input and output
00151   typedef ImageType::Pointer ImagePointer;
00152   typedef itk::ImageFileReader< ImageType >  ReaderType;
00153   typedef itk::ImageFileWriter< ImageType >  WriterType;
00154 
00155   ImagePointer maskImage;
00156   LabelFusionTool<PixelType> myTool;
00157 
00158   myTool.ReadInput(input_file);
00159   myTool.ReadAnatomicalImages(anatomical_file);
00160   myTool.ReadLabelImages(label_file);
00161 
00162   if(mask_file=="")                    //creating a mask image using the padding value
00163           myTool.SetPaddingValue(padding); 
00164   else{                                //reading the mask image
00165           ReaderType::Pointer maskReader = ReaderType::New();
00166           maskReader->SetFileName( mask_file );
00167           maskReader->Update();
00168           maskImage = maskReader->GetOutput();
00169           myTool.SetMaskImage(maskImage);
00170   }
00171                   
00172           
00173   if (hwn_file!="")
00174     myTool.ReadOneImage(hwn_file, myTool.m_hwnImage);
00175   if (hwvs_file!="")
00176     myTool.ReadOneImage(hwvs_file, myTool.m_hwvsImage);
00177           
00178   myTool.SetPatchSize(hwn);
00179   myTool.SetSpatialBandwidth(hwvs);
00180   myTool.SetSmoothing(beta);
00181   myTool.SetCentralPointStrategy(center);
00182   myTool.SetBlockwiseStrategy(block);
00183   myTool.SetAggregationStrategy(aggregation);
00184   myTool.SetOptimizationStrategy(optimized);  
00185   myTool.SetLowerThresholds(lowerMeanThreshold, lowerVarianceThreshold);
00186   myTool.SetNormalizationStrategy(normalization);
00187   myTool.SetMinLabel(minLabel);
00188 
00189   if(mode==0)
00190     myTool.ComputeOutput();
00191   if(mode==1)
00192     myTool.ComputeOutput_groupwise();  //groupwise
00193   if(mode==-1)
00194     myTool.ComputeDenoisedOutput();
00195 
00196   //Write the result 
00197   ImagePointer outputImage = ImageType::New();
00198   myTool.GetOutput(outputImage);
00199   WriterType::Pointer writer = WriterType::New();  
00200   writer->SetFileName( output_file );
00201   writer->SetInput( outputImage );
00202   writer->Update();  
00203 
00204           
00205   if (weight_file != "") {
00206     std::cout<<"Writing the weight image.\n";
00207     ImagePointer weightImage = ImageType::New();
00208     myTool.GetWeightImage(weightImage);
00209     WriterType::Pointer writerFilter = WriterType::New();  
00210     writerFilter->SetFileName( weight_file );
00211     writerFilter->SetInput( weightImage );
00212     writerFilter->Update();  
00213   }
00214            
00215         if( (fuzzy_weights.size() > 0) && (block==1) ){
00216                 for(unsigned int i=0; i<fuzzy_weights.size(); i++){
00217                         int current_label = fuzzy_weights[i];
00218 
00219                         itk::Image< float, 3 >::Pointer fuzzyWeightImage;
00220                         myTool.InitImage(fuzzyWeightImage);
00221                 itk::ImageFileWriter< itk::Image< float, 3 > >::Pointer writerFilter = itk::ImageFileWriter< itk::Image< float, 3 > >::New();
00222 
00223                         myTool.GetFuzzyWeightImage(fuzzyWeightImage, current_label);
00224 
00225                         std::string outputFilename = "fuzzyWeight_" ;
00226                         std::string extension = ".nii.gz";
00227                         std::ostringstream oss;
00228       oss << current_label ;
00229                         outputFilename += oss.str() + extension;
00230             writerFilter->SetFileName( outputFilename );
00231           writerFilter->SetInput( fuzzyWeightImage );
00232         writerFilter->Update();  
00233                 }
00234         }
00235   
00236   return 1;
00237   } catch (TCLAP::ArgException &e)  // catch any exceptions
00238   { std::cerr << "error: " << e.error() << " for arg " << e.argId() << std::endl; }
00239 }
